data.question: What is the empirical formula of the material synthesized from M(II) acetate hydrate and 1,3,5-benzenetricarboxylic acid?
What type of structure does Co3(BTC)2·12H2O have according to single crystal analysis?
What happens to M3(BTC)2·12H2O upon dehydration?
data.answer: It yields a porous solid, M3(BTC)2·H2O.

data.question: Is the inclusion of ammonia into the porous solid reversible?
What is the role of the last water ligand in the M3(BTC)2·H2O framework?
data.answer: It is necessary to maintain the structural arrangement of the porous framework using hydrogen bonds.

data.question: Can CO, CO2, H2S, CS2, CH3CN, and NC5H5 be included into the M3(BTC)2·H2O framework?
What is the pore size of the channels in the dehydrated M3(BTC)2·H2O framework?
Does the zinc compound maintain its framework during the dehydration and rehydration process?
What is the primary method used for the structure determination of Co3(BTC)2·12H2O?
What is the significance of the hydrogen bonding interactions in the structure of M3(BTC)2·12H2O?
data.answer: They yield a tightly held 3-D solid with a total of 56 hydrogen bonding interactions per formula unit.

data.question: Is the inclusion behavior of M3(BTC)2·H2O selective towards small guests with reactive lone electron pairs?
What is the formula weight of Co3(BTC)2·12H2O according to the crystallographic data?
Does the structure of M3(BTC)2·H2O allow for the inclusion of larger molecules?
data.answer: No, larger molecules are disallowed from entering the channels due to steric constraints.

data.question: What is the role of coordinately unsaturated metal centers in the M3(BTC)2·H2O framework?
data.answer: They serve as binding sites to other inclusions.

data.question: Is the dehydration of M3(BTC)2·12H2O to form M3(BTC)2·H2O a reversible process?
data.answer: Yes, structural order and crystallinity are reestablished upon rehydration.

data.question: What is the crystal system of Co3(BTC)2·12H2O?
Can the dehydrated M3(BTC)2·H2O framework be converted back to its starting material?
data.answer: Yes, by desorption of ammonia at 250 °C and 0.080 pressure for 5 h, followed by the addition of water.

data.question: Is the inclusion of water into the M3(BTC)2·H2O framework a quick process?
data.answer: Yes, it is completed as soon as the solid is immersed into the liquid.

data.question: What is the density (calculated) of Co3(BTC)2·12H2O?
Does the inclusion of ammonia into the Co and Ni frameworks of M3(BTC)2·H2O indicate partial dissociation of the metal from BTC?
data.answer: Yes, as suggested by elemental microanalysis giving a nitrogen value higher than expected.
